snippet.title: ROGUE GLITCH - The Corrupted Content Update
snippet.description:
Rogue Glitch - Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1092630/Rogue_Glitch/

In celebration of the update’s release, Rogue Glitch is 30% off for seven days ending on Friday the 24th! With a revamped game experience, additional content, music, and improvements to early progression, now is a great time to welcome new players and/or to bring a friend with you into the fray.

The power of the glitch-world has brought in a fresh range of creations to bolster your arsenal and new foes to turn into pixel-dust! Make room for:

MAJOR
- 4 new Zones (2 reworked) to discover...
- 3 new Bosses to defeat
- 20 new Items to collect
- 11 new Enemies to encounter
- 2 new Characters to unlock
- 5 new Special Rooms to find
- 7 new Music tracks, + some ambience

Read full update: https://store.steampowered.com/newshub/app/1092630/view/3278000488969106786
